settings.label: Page Width
settings.info: The default is full width (100%), and that's for all content.

settings.label: Padding
settings.info: These are container paddings for all content.

settings.label: Margin
settings.info: These are section spaces for all content.

settings.label: Large
settings.info: This is Large width, by default it is 1440px and you can use it in the custom settings section.

settings.label: Medium
settings.info: This is Medium width, by default it is 1024px and you can use it in the custom settings section.

settings.label: Small
settings.info: This is Small width, by default it is 960px and you can use it in the custom settings section.
